name: Production
description: Welcome to Production, the sandbox game where you will build a factory and try to earn as much money as possible. To earn money, create cargo, clean it, and transport them to the end! Are you ready to become the most famous and rich businessman/woman that ever lived? Download for free today! As always, suggestions and bug reports are welcome at vieirast@icloud.com. Keep in mind that this game is in early development, so expect the game to be extremely simple.
